block.p: GOLUB--Sally. The Conference of Presidents of Major American Jewish Organizations mourns the passing of Sally Golub, the beloved mother of our esteemed colleague and friend Rabbi Robert Golub, Executive Director, Mercaz USA. We pray that the Golub family will be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. June Walker, Chairperson Malcolm Hoenlein, Executive Vice Chairman

GOLUB--Sally. The Conference of Presidents of Major American Jewish Organizations mourns the passing of Sally Golub, the beloved mother of our esteemed colleague and friend Rabbi Robert Golub, Executive Director, Mercaz USA. We pray that the Golub family will be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. June Walker, Chairperson Malcolm Hoenlein, Executive Vice Chairman
